FinancialAccountStatement.name: FinancialAccountStatement
FinancialAccountStatement.description: Represents a periodic statement summary for a financial account.

Description.description: The description of the financial account statement.

EndDate.description: Indicates the end date of the financial account statement period.

FinancialAccountId.description: The financial account associated with the financial account statement.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date when a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date when a user viewed this record.

SourceSystemIdentifier.description: The unique identifier of the financial account statement in an external system.

StartDate.description: Indicates the start date of the financial account statement period.

Url.description: The URL of the statement attachment or file.
